LanguageData.PulsefireTurretGun.label: Pulsefire Turret
LanguageData.PulsefireTurretGun.description:
A turret with a sniper rifle on top that automtically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode when damaged. Can be upgraded.
Base defense Turret for military outposts. Has a direct impact rifle with Pulsefire technology attached to it. Maximum range, great accuracy and full metal jacket power mounted on an auto turret.
